reporting.reportvalue.ValueQuery: /* Returns the volume of sales from @FromDate to @ToDate */ SELECT CAST(ISNULL(SUM(OrderGrandTotalInMainCurrency),0) AS DECIMAL(38,1)) FROM COM_Order WHERE OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID AND (dateadd(hour,datediff(hour,0,@FromDate),0) <= OrderDate) AND (dateadd(hour,datediff(hour,0,dateadd(hour,1,@ToDate)),0) > OrderDate)
